item.title: [Hyperion] Teleport System [Hyperion]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Any constructive criticism is greatly appreciated.

[code=java]package org.hyperion.rs2.content.Teleport;

import org.hyperion.rs2.event.Event;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Animation;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Graphic;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Location;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Player;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.World;

public class TeleportHandler {

/*
 * Constructs our 
 */
public static TeleportHandler teleportPlayer(Player p, Location location, int type) {
	return new TeleportHandler(p, location, type);
}

public TeleportHandler(Player p, Location location, int type) {
	handleTeleport(p, new Teleport(location, type));
}


private void handleTeleport(final Player player, final Teleport teleport) {
	if(System.currentTimeMillis() - player.getButtonDelay() < TeleportConstants.buttonDelay) return;
	player.playAnimation(Animation.create(TeleportConstants.teleportStyles[teleport.getType()].getAnim()));
	player.playGraphics(Graphic.create(TeleportConstants.teleportStyles[teleport.getType()].getGFX(), TeleportConstants.teleportStyles[teleport.getType()].getGFXDelay()));
	World.getWorld().submit(new Event(2000) {
		@Override
		public void execute() {
				player.playAnimation(Animation.create(TeleportConstants.teleportStyles[teleport.getType()].getAnim2()));
				player.setLocation(teleport.getLocation());				
				stop();
		}
		
	});
	
}


  protected static enum TeleportStyles {
      ANCIENT(1979, 0x328, 392, 0),
      NORMAL(714, 715, 308, 45);
     
      private int anim, anim2, gfx, gfxDelay;
   
      private TeleportStyles(int anim, int anim2, int gfx, int gfxDelay) {
              this.anim = anim;
              this.anim2 = anim2;
              this.gfx = gfx;
              this.gfxDelay = gfxDelay;
      }
     
      /*
       * @param anim
       */
      public int getAnim() {
              return anim;
      }
     
      /*
       * @param 2nd anim
       */
      public int getAnim2() {
              return anim2;
      }
     
      /*
       * @param gfx
       */
      public int getGFX() {
              return gfx;
      }
     
      /*
       * @param delay gfx
       */
      public int getGFXDelay() {
              return gfxDelay;
      }

}

}
[/code]

[code=java]package org.hyperion.rs2.content.Teleport;

import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Location;

public class Teleport {

private int type;
private Location location;

public Teleport(Location location, int type) {
	this.location = location;
	this.type = type;
}

public int getType() {
	return type;
}

 public Location getLocation() {
	return location;
}

}

[/code]

package org.hyperion.rs2.content.Teleport;

import org.hyperion.rs2.content.Teleport.TeleportHandler.TeleportStyles;
import org.hyperion.rs2.model.Location;

public class TeleportConstants {
	
	/*
	 * different teleports e.x. ancients, lunar, normal
	 */
	public static final TeleportStyles teleportStyles[] = {TeleportStyles.NORMAL, 
														   TeleportStyles.ANCIENT
		};
	
	//Button Delay
	protected static final short buttonDelay = 4000;

	//Type of teleport
	public static final byte NORMAL = 0, ANCIENT = 1, LUNAR = 2;
	
	
	/*
	 * All areas
	 */
	public static final Location VARROCK = new Location(3210, 3424, 0);
	public static final Location LUMBRIDGE = new Location(3222, 3218, 0);
	public static final Location FALADOR = new Location(2965, 3380, 0);
	public static final Location CAMELOT = new Location(3275, 3477, 0);
	public static final Location ARDOUGNE = new Location(2662, 3305, 0);
}

So to make a teleport you add it to the constants folder like this.

and where ever you want it executed you would do

TeleportHandler.teleportPlayer(player, TeleportConstants.PLACE, type);

Read full topic
